item.title: Monday Api 001 Dev
item.description: Things need to do: Design Application Structures: REST API, Core Module Design REST API Endpoints Design Models, Schemas, Services Document REST API Endpoints Design Data Validations Design Pagination, Search Integrate Services with Related Resources Secured: CORS, JWT Testing API with Postman Improvement with: Index, Caching, Elastic Search,… Automation: make generators that generate new resources endpoint from json data Common Services: Mailer & SMS, Cron, Task Queues Deployment: Heroku, VPS, CI & CD with gitlab, ci Related things:
